licensing: Do not copy proprietary text; author original summaries.
privacy: Do not include secrets or personal data in approval requests.
safety: Do not overwrite existing approval request records.
Reject context and approval_id values containing path separators or dot-segments.

acceptance_criteria: Creates an approval request under runtime/contexts/<context>/approvals/.
Fails when an approval request with the same id already exists.
Logs a U.Work record when telemetry/log-work is available.

failure_modes: Missing required inputs (context, session_id, approval_id, summary).
Invalid context or approval_id value (not a safe path segment).
Failed to write the approval request file.

inputs.description: Bounded context name used to locate runtime/contexts/<context> (must be a safe path segment).
inputs.name: context

inputs.description: Session identifier requesting approval (safe path segment).
inputs.name: session_id

inputs.description: Short summary of the approval request.
inputs.name: summary

inputs.description: Optional semicolon-delimited list of approval requirement keys.
inputs.name: required_for

inputs.description: Optional due date for the approval request.
inputs.name: due_by

inputs.description: Optional semicolon-delimited list of related artifact paths.
inputs.name: artifacts

inputs.description: Optional RoleAssignment label used when logging U.Work (default: Strategist).
inputs.name: role_assignment

inputs.description: Optional semicolon-delimited list of related DRR ids or paths.
inputs.name: decisions

inputs.description: Optional ISO-8601 timestamp_start override (used for deterministic testing).
inputs.name: timestamp_start

intent.goal: Record a structured approval request for human review.

name: Request Approval

outputs.description: Path to the generated approval request markdown file.
outputs.name: approval_request_path

procedure.instruction: Validate required inputs (context, session_id, approval_id, summary) and ensure safe path segments.
Resolve the approval request path and ensure it does not already exist.
Write the approval request record with status pending.
If telemetry/log-work is available, log the approval request with agent metadata when provided.

summary: Requests approval for a constrained action or change.
